title: First closure of US government since 2018 begins after funding bill fails – as it happened
summary: The Senate rejected competing bills amid accusations of partisan politics from both Republicans and Democrats. This highlights the ongoing divisions within Congress, preventing progress on key legislation. The failure to pass the bills reflects the broader challenges of bipartisan cooperation.

summary: Australia is set to face New Zealand in a three-match Twenty20 series at Bay Oval in Tauranga. Angus Fontaine will provide live updates on the matches. Fans can look forward to exciting cricket action between the two teams.

title: Death of an Ordinary Man by Sarah Perry review – a brilliant meditation on mortality
summary: The author of "The Essex Serpent" shares a poignant reflection on her father-in-law's battle with illness, highlighting the emotional complexities of caregiving and loss. Her account captures universal themes of grief and connection, resonating with many who have faced similar situations. This intimate narrative offers comfort and understanding to readers navigating their own experiences with illness and death.
